TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontWeight extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 以笔画的粗细来引用字体的密度。

span.span: Refers to the density of a typeface, in terms of the lightness or heaviness of the strokes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增加的笔画或与一种字体，相比与同一字样"正常"字符中的给定字符相关联的粗细通常区分粗细差异。Weight differences are generally differentiated by an increased stroke or thickness that is associated with a given character in a typeface, as compared to a "normal" character from that same typeface. **请注意**并非所有的权重是可用于所有字体。**Note** Not all weights are available for all typefaces. 不适用于一种字体粗细值时，则返回最接近的匹配权重。When a weight is not available for a typeface, the closest matching weight is returned. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: When the return value is less than zero, is less than .

returns.span: 当该值大于零时，指示 大于 。

span.span: When the value is greater than zero, it indicates that is greater than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 浅字体权重是早于粗的字体粗细。Lighter font weights are lesser than heavier font weights. 例如，"浅色"或"Normal"的字体粗细小于"UltraBold"字体粗细。For example, a "Light" or "Normal" font weight is lesser than an "UltraBold" font weight. ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中，方法用于计算两个对象。In the following code example, the method is used to evaluate two objects. [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontSnippet11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#fontsnippet11)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontSnippet11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#fontsnippet11)]
